message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to make a smart investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob, but I'm afraid I'm not quite comfortable with your offer of $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I can offer it to you for $1050000.
I understand you're trying to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $950000?
I understand that $950000 is still a bit of a stretch for you, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $1000000, which is as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $975000. Is that a deal?
